thread.title: Three-Week Bridge Blockade Hits Nepal Economy
thread.title_full: Three-Week Bridge Blockade Hits Nepal Economy - WSJ

author: Krishna Pokharel
title: Three-Week Bridge Blockade Hits Nepal Economy
text:
BIRGUNJ, Nepal—Thousands of demonstrators opposed to Nepal’s new constitution blocked an important border crossing with India on Wednesday—day 21 of a sit-in that has hobbled the country’s economy and set back reconstruction efforts after this year’s devastating earthquakes.
The protesters, members of Nepal’s plains-dwelling Madhesi communities, have pitched tents on the concrete bridge that connects Nepal with its giant southern...
